snippet: McCRACKEN--Charles P. April 11, 1926 - November 5, 1997. Today would have been your 90th birthday. We have memories of your life, lived larger than life. Charles 1/3
lead_paragraph: McCRACKEN--Charles P. April 11, 1926 - November 5, 1997. Today would have been your 90th birthday. We have memories of your life, lived larger than life. Charles 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  MCCRACKEN, CHARLES P
